entry.title: takeshy/wysimark-lite: wysimark ( https://github.com/portive/wysimark ) is a modern and clean rich text editor for React, supporting CommonMark and GFM Markdown spec. It is a fork of wysimark with some modifications to make it more lightweight and easier to use.
entry.content: wysimark ( https://github.com/portive/wysimark ) is a modern and clean rich text editor for React, supporting CommonMark and GFM Markdown spec. It is a fork of wysimark with some modifications to make it more lightweight and easier to use.
